title: Himalayan Silence: Manali Wilderness
description: A 5-day immersive journey into the quiet corners of the Himalayas. Move beyond the crowded tourist trails into secluded pine forests and hidden waterfalls. This is not just a trek; it is a guided practice in slowing down, with daily meditation sessions, silent walks, and evenings spent around a fire sharing stories.
includes: Local Transport from Manali Bus Stand

itinerary.title: Arrival & Grounding
itinerary.description: Arrive in Manali and transfer to our secluded homestay in Nasogi. Briefing on the 'Art of Slow Travel'. Evening silent walk through the apple orchards.

itinerary.title: Into the Cedar Forests
itinerary.description: We leave civilization behind and trek gently up to the Lama Dugh meadow. The focus is on rhythmic breathing and noticing the micro-details of the forest.

itinerary.title: The Ridge of Silence
itinerary.description: A slightly challenging climb to the ridge offering panoramic views of Indrasan and Deo Tibba. We spend an hour in noble silence at the top.

itinerary.title: Descent & Community
itinerary.description: Return to the valley. Afternoon free for rest. Evening community dinner with local hosts, learning about mountain culture and folklore.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Morning tea and reflection. Check-out and transfer to Manali bus stand with a renewed sense of calm.

testimonials.author: Sarah J.
testimonials.text: I came looking for a break, I found a whole new way of seeing. The silence was exactly what I needed.

testimonials.author: Dhruv K.
testimonials.text: QuietSummit lives up to its name. Perfectly curated, deeply respectful of nature.

title: Monastic Spiti: High Altitude Stillness
description: A high-altitude expedition into the stark, lunar landscapes of Spiti Valley. We visit ancient monasteries not just to see them, but to practice with the monks. This journey pushes your physical limits while expanding your mental space.

itinerary.title: Shimla to Kalpa
itinerary.description: The journey begins. A long scenic drive to Kalpa, viewing the sacred Kinner Kailash peak at sunset.

itinerary.title: Entering the Valley: Nako & Tabo
itinerary.description: Crossing into the arid high desert. Visit Nako lake and the 1000-year-old Tabo monastery.

itinerary.title: Dhankar & Kaza
itinerary.description: Hike to Dhankar Lake for clarity. Afternoon arrival in Kaza, the headquarters of Spiti.

itinerary.title: The Highest Villages: Langza & Komic
itinerary.description: Driving to some of the world's highest inhabited villages. Fossil hunting and sending postcards from the world's highest post office.

itinerary.title: Monastic Life: Key Monastery
itinerary.description: A day dedicated to Key Monastery. We join the monks for morning prayers and have a private session on Buddhist philosophy.

itinerary.title: Chandratal: The Moon Lake
itinerary.description: Drive to the mesmerising Chandratal lake. Camping under a blanket of stars.

itinerary.title: Return to Manali
itinerary.description: Crossing the Kunzum and Rohtang/Atal passes to return to the lush greenery of Manali.

testimonials.author: Elena R.
testimonials.text: Spiti changed me. The landscape is unforgiving but incredibly beautiful. QuietSummit organized it perfectly.

title: Wayanad: Forest Bathing & Coffee
description: A gentle, sensory journey through the misty rainforests of Wayanad. Stay in a coffee estate, learn the art of brewing, and walk silently through ancient groves. Perfect for those looking to reset their nervous system.

itinerary.title: Arrival at the Estate
itinerary.description: Check into a heritage bungalow in the middle of a 100-acre coffee estate. Evening campfire and listening to the forest sounds.

itinerary.title: The Coffee Journey
itinerary.description: From bean to cup. Participate in the harvesting (seasonal) or processing of coffee. Afternoon tasting session.

itinerary.title: Edakkal & The Caves
itinerary.description: A morning trek to the Neolithic Edakkal Caves. Afternoon free for reading or Ayurvedic massage (optional).

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Breakfast with the birds. Departure to Calicut.

testimonials.author: Priya M.
testimonials.text: Green, lush, and peaceful. The food was incredible.

title: Ladakh: The High Desert Monastery
description: Experience the stark beauty of Ladakh. Visit ancient monasteries perched on craggy peaks, meditate by the azure Pangong Lake, and lose yourself in the vastness of the high desert.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization in Leh
itinerary.description: Rest day to adapt to the high altitude. Evening walk to Shanti Stupa.

itinerary.title: Monasteries of the Indus Valley
itinerary.description: Visit Thiksey and Hemis monasteries to witness morning prayers.

itinerary.title: Crossing Khardung La
itinerary.description: Drive over one of the world's highest motorable passes to Nubra Valley.

itinerary.title: Pangong Tso
itinerary.description: Journey to the famous changing colors lake. Overnight by the lakeside.

itinerary.title: Return to Leh
itinerary.description: Drive back via Chang La pass. Farewell dinner.

title: Kashmir: The Silent Valley
description: Drift on Dal Lake, walk through saffron fields, and find peace in the meadows of Pahalgam. A journey through 'Paradise on Earth' focusing on its quieter, untouched side.

itinerary.title: Pahalgam Meadows
itinerary.description: Day trip to the Valley of Shepherds.

itinerary.title: Gulmarg Gondola
itinerary.description: Visit the meadow of flowers and take the cable car.

itinerary.title: Mughal Gardens
itinerary.description: Walk through history in Nishat and Shalimar gardens.

title: Meghalaya: Root Bridges & Rain
description: Trek to the double-decker root bridges, explore crystal clear rivers, and witness the wettest place on earth. a journey into the heart of the Khasi hills.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Shillong
itinerary.description: Drive from Guwahati to the Scotland of the East.

itinerary.title: Double Decker Trek
itinerary.description: The challenging but rewarding trek to the living root bridges.

itinerary.title: Dawki River
itinerary.description: Boating on the crystal clear Umngot river.

title: Coorg: Coffee & Mist
description: Wake up to the smell of coffee and the sound of birds. Explore the lush plantations of Coorg, hike to Abbey Falls, and visit the serene Tibetan monastery.

title: Varkala: Cliffside Calm
description: Perched on dramatic red cliffs overlooking the Arabian Sea, Varkala is a place to unwind. Daily yoga by the ocean, Ayurvedic treatments, and sunset walks.

itinerary.title: Cliff Arrival
itinerary.description: Check in and sunset at the cliff.

itinerary.title: Yoga & Beach
itinerary.description: Morning yoga followed by beach time.

title: Rishikesh: The Source of Yoga
description: Connect with your spiritual side in the Yoga Capital of the World. Stay in a peaceful ashram, attend Ganga Aarti, and raft on the holy river.

itinerary.title: Ashram Life
itinerary.description: Welcome to the banks of the Ganga.

title: Jaisalmer: Desert Star Gazing
description: Sleep under a canopy of stars in the Thar Desert. Camel safaris, folk music by the campfire, and the golden silence of the dunes.

title: Andaman: Blue Solitude
description: Turquoise waters and white sands. Discover the underwater world of Havelock and relax on the pristine Radhanagar beach.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Back to Port Blair and fly out.

title: Sikkim: The Hidden Kingdom
description: Prayer flags fluttering in the wind, snow-capped peaks of Kanchenjunga, and warm hospitality. Explore the Buddhist culture of Gangtok and North Sikkim.

title: Hampi: Ruins & Boulders
description: A landscape of giant boulders and ancient temple ruins. Explore the Vijaynagar empire's remnants on bicycle and watch the sunset from Matanga Hill.

title: Gokarna: The Coastal Trek
description: Trek across 5 pristine beaches separated by hills. A unique combination of hiking and beach relaxation away from the crowds.

title: Valley of Flowers: Nature's Canvas
description: A UNESCO world heritage site that comes alive with millions of blooms in the monsoon. A high altitude trek into a floral wonderland.

title: Pondicherry: French Quietude
description: Cycle through the French Quarter, meditate at the Aurobindo Ashram, and visit the experimental township of Auroville.

title: Zanskar: The Frozen Path
description: The ultimate winter expedition. Walk on the frozen Zanskar river, sleeping in caves and surviving in sub-zero temperatures.

title: Darjeeling: Tea & Clouds
description: Colonial charm, steam engines, and the world's best tea. Watch the sunrise over Kanchenjunga from Tiger Hill.

title: Munnar: Tea Garden Solitude
description: Endless rolling hills of green. Trek through the tea gardens, spot the Nilgiri Tahr, and breathe the fresh mountain air.

title: Tirthan Valley: The Secret River
description: The gateway to the Great Himalayan National Park. Trout fishing, river crossing, and absolute seclusion.
